titleStmt.title: Articles exhibited in Parliament against William Archbishop of Canterbury, Feb. 25. 1640. Published by a true and perfect copy
Proceedings. 1641-02-25
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Years on title page are given according to Lady Day dating; the articles were presented on 25 Feb. 1641.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
